descriptionHtml:
Once a year, the nords of Skyrim have a celebration of Sithis, to attempt to appease the lord of death so they may live one more year. They dress the cities it death, and celebrate for a month. Visit the cities to partake in the celebration. It is said that a servant of Sithis will be given special rewards from their lord.
This mod is still in Alpha, just reserving the spot on Nexus.
author: NomNomPacMan
